body: This medium armor consists of hundreds of small, interlocking pieces of steel shaped to resemble an ancient symbol for the word “mountain.” The mail is then riveted to a cloth or leather backing. It is worn like a mail coat and covers your torso, shoulders, and thighs.
name: Mountain Pattern Armor
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Armor/Mountain Pattern Armor
